column4: Rynol: Sound issue is linked to the flash player, typing 'sudo alsa force-reload' into a terminal fixes it
will that take sound away from my firefox?
i mean, from flash content inside my firefox?
(i mean, from flash content inside my firefox?) Yes
so once I do the reload thing, my flash-in-firefox will have no more sound? lol I will rather keep the sound in firefox than those in the system.
No, the command resets the sound in Ubuntu as a whole, It fixes both.
